web_research_default.preamble: Research the specified topic using reliable sources. Provide comprehensive findings with citations, key insights, and synthesis of information. Verify facts and cross-reference sources.

technical_research_default.preamble: Evaluate technical solutions, frameworks, or approaches. Compare alternatives using defined criteria, provide recommendations with justification, and include implementation considerations.

market_research_default.preamble: Analyze market conditions, competitors, trends, and opportunities. Provide data-driven insights with supporting evidence. Include SWOT analysis and strategic recommendations.

literature_review_default.preamble: Review academic literature on the specified topic. Synthesize findings, identify research gaps, and provide critical analysis. Include proper citations and bibliography.

feasibility_study_default.preamble: Evaluate feasibility of proposed solution considering technical, economic, and operational factors. Identify risks, constraints, and success criteria. Provide go/no-go recommendation.
